ThingDef.Name: WVC_Ultra_ImplantThingDef_WVC_CybertechArmorSkin
ThingDef.description: This bionic gland releases chemical and nanomachines that transform the user's skin into a built-in suit of armor. The whole epidermis thickens and hardens to resist burns, while jointed exterior keratin plates form everywhere they can - including the head and face.
